sourcesContent:
import "./TourCard.css" import { Card,CardBody } from "reactstrap"; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import React from 'react'; const TourCard = ({tour}) => { const {id,title,city,photo,price,featured,avgRating,reviews}=tour return (
Featured
{city} {avgRating}({reviews.length})
{title }
${price} /per person
); } export default TourCard;
